
<table cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0"><tbody><tr><td class="t_f" id="postmessage_52072683">
近期在看倪师的针灸课程，想要一本准确的经络穴位图解的书籍，找了好多。搜索后很多人推荐《经穴大全》，这本由日本人编著的中医书籍下载了好多个版本都不清晰，偶然在网上找到这版超清版。发出来方便大家学习。<br>
<img id="aimg_XxsrN" onclick="zoom(this, this.src, 0, 0, 0)" class="zoom" file="https://pic2.ziyuan.wang/user/goodert2024/2024/12/_日_经穴大全-坂元大海、原岛广至_78a6281ce5bdb.jpg" onmouseover="img_onmouseoverfunc(this)" lazyloadthumb="1" border="0" alt="" src="https://pic2.ziyuan.wang/user/goodert2024/2024/12/_日_经穴大全-坂元大海、原岛广至_78a6281ce5bdb.jpg"><img id="aimg_S93n9" onclick="zoom(this, this.src, 0, 0, 0)" class="zoom" width="902" height="1280" file="https://pic2.ziyuan.wang/user/goodert2024/2024/12/_日_经穴大全-坂元大海、原岛广至2_1634195ece297.jpg" border="0" alt="" src="https://pic2.ziyuan.wang/user/goodert2024/2024/12/_日_经穴大全-坂元大海、原岛广至2_1634195ece297.jpg"><br>
